attributes.additional_details: Students need to pay far more for tuition I think
attributes.background: Increase tuition fees from £9,250 to £925,000 because that'd be good for the economy

rejection.details:
The Government restricts the maximum amount that universities can charge home students for certain degrees, but deciding what to charge below that cap is a matter for individual universities, not the Government or House of Commons.

If you want the Government to remove the restrictions on what universities can charge home students for certain degrees we could accept a petition requesting this.
